text:
Software Development Engineer (SDE)
Design, develop, test, and maintain software applications. Work with data structures, algorithms,
and system design to build scalable and efficient solutions. Collaborate with teams to solve
real-world problems using programming languages and modern frameworks.

Data Analyst
Collect, clean, and analyze data to generate insights. Use tools like Excel, SQL, Python, and
visualization platforms to identify trends and support data-driven decision-making.

Human Resources (HR)
Manage recruitment, employee relations, onboarding, performance management, and company
policies. Ensure a positive workplace culture and support organizational growth.

Marketing Executive
Plan and execute marketing campaigns to promote products or services. Analyze customer
behavior, manage social media, create content, and support brand growth through digital and
offline channels.

Intern (Technical / Non-Technical)
Assist team members in daily tasks and projects. Learn practical skills, gain industry exposure, and
contribute under guidance while developing professional and technical abilities.

Software Development Engineer (SDE)
Job Description: A Software Development Engineer is responsible for designing, developing,
testing, and maintaining software applications. The role involves writing clean and efficient code,
solving technical problems, and working with teams to build scalable and reliable systems.
Key Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain software applications
- Write clean, efficient, and reusable code
- Debug and fix software issues
- Collaborate with designers and other developers
- Participate in code reviews and testing
Required Skills:
- Programming languages (Java, Python, C++, JavaScript, etc.)
- Data Structures and Algorithms
- Problem-solving skills
- Basic knowledge of databases and APIs

Data Analyst
Job Description: A Data Analyst is responsible for collecting, cleaning, and analyzing data to help
organizations make informed decisions. The role involves identifying patterns, preparing reports,
and presenting insights using data analysis tools.
Key Responsibilities:
- Collect and organize data from multiple sources
- Clean and preprocess raw data
- Analyze data to identify trends and patterns
- Prepare reports and dashboards
- Support decision-making with data insights
Required Skills:
- Excel, SQL, and basic Python/R
- Data visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.)
- Analytical and logical thinking
- Basic statistics knowledge

Human Resources (HR)
Job Description: A Human Resources professional manages employee-related activities such as
recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement. The role focuses on maintaining a positive
work environment and supporting organizational policies.
Key Responsibilities:
- Assist in recruitment and interview processes
- Manage employee records and documentation
- Support onboarding and training activities
- Handle employee queries and communication
- Ensure compliance with company policies
Required Skills:
- Communication and interpersonal skills
- Organizational and documentation skills
- Basic knowledge of HR processes
- Problem-solving and teamwork

Marketing Executive
Job Description: A Marketing Executive is responsible for promoting products or services through
online and offline marketing strategies. The role focuses on understanding customer needs,
creating campaigns, and increasing brand awareness.
Key Responsibilities:
- Plan and execute marketing campaigns
- Manage social media platforms and content
- Conduct market research and analysis
- Assist in branding and promotional activities
- Track campaign performance and engagement
Required Skills:
- Communication and creativity
- Basic digital marketing knowledge
- Social media and content creation skills
- Analytical and presentation skills

Intern (Technical / Non-Technical)
Job Description: An Intern supports team members in day-to-day tasks while gaining practical
industry experience. The role focuses on learning, skill development, and assisting with ongoing
projects under supervision.
Key Responsibilities:
- Assist in assigned tasks and projects
- Learn tools, technologies, or processes
- Support team members as required
- Complete tasks within deadlines
- Follow organizational guidelines
Required Skills:
- Willingness to learn
- Basic technical or domain knowledge
- Communication and teamwork
- Time management skills
